name: iionly/elggx_userpoints
description: This plugin provides a mechanism for users to gain or lose points for performing certain actions on your site.

suggest.coldtrick/widget_manager: With the Widget Manager plugin available the Elggx Userpoints plugin offers a widget for the index page (homepage) listing the members with most userpoints.
suggest.elgg/members: With the bundled Members plugin enabled the Elggx Userpoints plugin can display the members' userpoints also on the member page.
suggest.iionly/expirationdate: With the Expirationdate plugin available the userpoints can be configured to expire after a certain interval (e.g. after a day, week, or a year).
